message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $100. It's a great deal, and I think it would be very valuable to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I've done some research and I'm not sure it's worth $100 to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $80 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and settle on $90?  That way, we both get a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant. How about we meet in the middle at $85? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm not sure I can go all the way to $90.
